columns.Film_ID: The unique identifier for each film entry.
columns.Rank_in_series: The ranking of the film within its series.
columns.Number_in_season: The sequential number of the film in its season.
columns.Title: The title of the film as presented to the audience.
columns.Directed_by: The name of the director responsible for the film.
columns.Original_air_date: The original dates when the film aired.
columns.Production_code: The unique code assigned to the film's production.

film.table_description: The film table captures details about films in the cinema database.

columns.Cinema_ID: The unique identifier for each cinema record.
columns.Name: The name of the cinema as recognized by patrons.
columns.Openning_year: The year when the cinema first opened its doors.
columns.Capacity: The maximum number of patrons the cinema can accommodate.
columns.Location: The geographical location of the cinema.

cinema.table_description: The cinema table holds details about different cinema locations.

columns.Cinema_ID: The unique identifier for each cinema involved in the schedule.
columns.Film_ID: The unique identifier for each film related to the schedule.
columns.Date: The date when the film is scheduled to be shown.
columns.Show_times_per_day: The number of times the film shows on that day.
columns.Price: The cost of a ticket to see the film.

schedule.table_description: The schedule table organizes information about film showings at cinemas.
